title: Directs the office of children and family services to examine the impact of children of mothers with HIV on the social services system
summary: Directs the office of children and family services to examine the impact of orphaned children of mothers with HIV on the social services system; requires that such department report to the legislature with a comprehensive plan in response to its findings.
actClause: AN ACT to direct the office of children and family services to examine the impact of children orphaned by HIV mothers
